headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DONOVAN, ROBERT V

snippet: DONOVAN--Robert V. The Employees of Alliant Insurance Services, Inc. sadly record the passing of our colleague, friend and mentor, Robert V. Donovan. Bob was greatly respected by his peers and admired by his many clients, all of whom relied on his wisdom for decades. We send condolences to Bob's wife, Carol and his children Carol, James and Chris. John S. Beres, James V. Mannino 1/3
lead_paragraph: DONOVAN--Robert V. The Employees of Alliant Insurance Services, Inc. sadly record the passing of our colleague, friend and mentor, Robert V. Donovan. Bob was greatly respected by his peers and admired by his many clients, all of whom relied on his wisdom for decades. We send condolences to Bob's wife, Carol and his children Carol, James and Chris.
